Source.Name: intel-compute-runtime
Source.Summary: Intel® Graphics Compute Runtime for oneAPI Level Zero and OpenCL™ Driver
Source.Description: The Intel(R) Graphics Compute Runtime for oneAPI Level Zero and OpenCL(TM) Driver is an open source project providing compute API support (Level Zero, OpenCL) for Intel graphics hardware architectures (HD Graphics, Xe).

Package.Name: intel-compute-runtime

Package.Description: The Intel(R) Graphics Compute Runtime for oneAPI Level Zero and OpenCL(TM) Driver is an open source project providing compute API support (Level Zero, OpenCL) for Intel graphics hardware architectures (HD Graphics, Xe).
